title: Bug 118780 - Column aliases not displayed correctly in expression builder when selecting dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the original column names are displayed instead of the defined aliases.
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting the dataset, the column aliases should be displayed instead of the original column names.
SR:
1. Open the expression builder. 
2. Select the dataset.
3. Double click on the first column name.
4. Observe that the alias name should be displayed instead of the original name.
